name: Plutonia 3: Going to Surface
summary: Plutonia 3: Going to Surface (sometimes corrected as Plutonia 3: Going to the Surface) is a 32-level megawad created by Sergey Andreevich Burow (SilverMiner) as an unofficial sequel to Plutonia 2. It is known for its poor quality, involving many rookie map errors and poor map design. Plutonia 3 was uploaded to the idgames archive on July 2, 2017 and was later removed from the archive completely. An unofficial joke sequel, Plutonia 4, was made by Gothic as an April Fools joke in 2018.
